Class ReplacementMethodSettingsMenu

java.lang.Object
ie.atu.sw.menu.Menu
ie.atu.sw.menu.SettingsMenu
ie.atu.sw.simplifiermenu.WordReplacerSettingsMenu
ie.atu.sw.simplifiermenu.ReplacementMethodSettingsMenu
public class ReplacementMethodSettingsMenu extends WordReplacerSettingsMenu
Menu for configuring the replacement method in the WordReplacer.

      inputReader - the input reader interface for user input.
      menuPrinter - the menu printer interface for output.
      preferences - the preferences object for storing settings.
      wordReplacer - the WordReplacerAbstract instance to configure.

      protected void initWordReplacer()
      Abstract method to initialize the WordReplacer settings. Implementations should configure specific settings for the WordReplacer.

    • createMenuItems

      protected void createMenuItems()
      Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses to define the menu items. This method is called during the construction of the menu to populate it with items.
      Specified by:
      createMenuItems in class Menu

    • printPreferences

      public void printPreferences()
      Prints the current user preferences to the console. This method should be implemented by subclasses to display the specific preferences.
      Specified by:
      printPreferences in class SettingsMenu

    • resetPreferences

      public void resetPreferences()
      Resets the user preferences to their default values. This method should be implemented by subclasses to define how preferences are reset.
      Specified by:
      resetPreferences in class SettingsMenu
